config.question: Which of the following most advanced the growth of agriculture and manufacturing in the United States in the 1810s and 1820s?

choices.content: a sense of unity among people

answer_3.response: Consider This: Farmers began to produce staple crops to sell rather than subsistence crops for their own families. Coastal shipping eased the problem to some extent in the East and stimulated the growth of port cities. See L.O. 9.2 How did developments in transportation support the growth of agriculture and manufacturing?
